meanings.sent1: The moorcock strutted proudly in the field.
meanings.sent2: I saw a moorcock flying over the moor.
meanings.sent3: Why did the moorcock cross the road? To get to the other side!
meanings.sent4: The moorcock stood out like a fiery gem against the green backdrop.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the moorcock's feathers dazzled in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: He tried to moorcock for his dinner but missed.
meanings.sent2: The hunters moorcocked skillfully in the wild.
meanings.sent3: I hope you don't moorcock any moorcocks by accident!
meanings.sent4: She moorcocked her target with precision and skill.
meanings.sent5: The old man told tales of how he used to moorcock in his youth.
